Bright (Jenụwarị úbọchị itoolu, 1940 rụo ụbọchị irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba, 2019) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé nkuzi nka

Ọ ghọrọ "onye isi Africa America mbụ na-arụ ọrụ oge niile" na alma mater ya, Youngstown State University, ọ bụkwa ónyé guzobere na onye nduzi nke mmemme Africana Studies site na 1970 ruo 1987. Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ ya n'ọtụtụ ebe ngosi ihe mgbe ochie, gụnyere Butler Institute of American Art na Canton Museum of Art.
